game.name: Lamborghini drift simulator
game.description:
Enter this Lamborghini Drift Simulator and forget the car racing games you have ever tried! This brand new car racing game will take you to a platform where you will enjoy ultimate physics of a beautiful and luxury car. At many instances, you would feel like driving a real four-wheeler due to its high-definition graphics and awesome soundtrack. So, it does not make a sense to waste your time anymore. Join this real car race fun to get a chance to become a professional drifter in the virtual world!
No need to drive rashly on the road. Put your fingers on the keys and get ready to drive smoothly to complete mission in each level! Your good training over the car handling and speed will make your way to the victory soon. There are no traffic tickets and no special rules to follow to become a racer in this cool html5 3D car game. Your perfect driving skills will make a way to perform the perfect drift on road. There is no need to bother at all as performing death-defying skills is not going to cause any applause like it can do if you do in the real life. 
Apply your skills to feel the real passion of drift and the power of speed in this exciting and engaging 3D luxury car simulation! Drive Lamborghini through the trail and prove the world that you can race and drift any car! This cool html5 car mobile game will be enough to bring you the high quality driving experience. Check out more car drifting simulators on our website and have fun to the best possible way!
